Juego too guapo con tus amigos, arreglando generadores y gritando corre timmy que te agarran!!!!!!!, al final te diviertes mas haci√©ndole bullying al asesino corriendo en c√≠rculos. 10/10

Fun game with friends, but has its flaws. It is annoying how you can not earn progression towards characters and killers when doing custom games, making it feel punishing for wanting to play with a group of people. The amount of DLC also make it feel like I am missing out on content for not wanting to pay for every pack that comes out. When it is on sale, it's not heavily discounted even though some of them came out over a year ago. Other than that, the game is fun and exciting. Trying to survive is scary and gets your heart pumping. It's great that the developers are still constantly supporting the game and the community is quite active. I would suggest buying the game from another site however, as it is often cheaper than Steam. Humble Bundle often sells it, bundled with other games so you get more for your money. Overall, its a great game with friends if you enjoy playing as the survivors. Personally for me, I can't play it alone and rather be with three other friends but playing alone still has its charm. Definitely give it a try as the game often has free weekends.

Pretty fun game whether you're playing alone or with friends if you're into fast pase hide and seek type horror games - this is the game for you. Admitably there are some bugs within the game, but if the developers looked into them they should be an easy fix. One of them being that if you do play with a party of friends you have to re send an invite every game you play. But, asides from that - fun game! ~

DbD ist ein sehr am√ºsantes und Nervenkitzelndes Spiel. Sowohl als Killer als auch als Surviver hat man hier und da schonmal echt hohen Puls aber das steigert meines erachtens nach nur den Spielspa√ü. Die Grafik ist sehr gut und die Steuerung einfach zu merken. Das einzige was nervt sind die ein oder anderen Spieler die einem nicht den Sieg aber auch keine Niederlage g√∂nnen, welche bei jedem Sieg einen beschimpfen oder melden weil man angeblich irgendwelche Hacks benutzt die man nicht mal kennt oder bei einer Niederlage kein GG sondern ein Easy, Noob sucking Killer etc schreiben statt es auf sich beruhen zu lassen.  Aber daf√ºr kann der Entwickler ja nichts.

Mit Freunden zusammen macht es noch mehr Spa√ü im Survive with friends oder Kill your friends ist es lustiger als allein. Also alles in einem ein super Spiel mit Suchtfaktor.

Recomendado siempre y cuando lo juegues con amigos, si no es una total perdida de dinero. Hay mecanicas que respectan a los asesinos que tendrian que mejorar por el bien de los supervivientes, por ejemplo, el hecho de quedarse campeando el gancho de un superviviente esta rotisimo. Hay ciertos asesinos con habilidades muy rotas o muy rapidos. En general no suele molestar si mantenes una buena comunicacion con tus compa√±eros, pero eso solo es lograble via Discord o alguna app parecida, ya que ingame no tenes ninguna forma de comunicarte.

Dead By Daylight is a bit hard to describe fully, so I'll just keep it as short as is reasonable without leaving anything out

It's a decent game of 4v1 in which four survivors try to escape a killer. The survivors use teamwork to repair generators and avoid being hit by the killer while the killer hunts for the survivors and tries to put them on hooks as a sacrifice.
A simple setup with reasonably varied killers and survivors. The maps are generally decent enough for the survivors to be able to run away or hide if they know what they're doing, and there are enough different maps to not get stale too easily

But at the same time, it gets repetitive as every game has the same objectives, and the same ways to get to those objectives. For killers, you employ your special powers and try to outsmart the survivors. For survivors, you spend a while doing QTEs on a generator while someone else runs away, or you spend your time running from the killer while the rest does QTEs. Then the exit opens and everyone tries to walk out. Or you died to the killer before you fixed enough generators. Either way, time to move on to do more of the same.
Balance wise things are a bit messy, with some perks being almost mandatory and others not worth taking in the slightest. There is a massive amount of grinding to get to the good perks and addons, and there are a lot of completely useless things you pick up along the way. Plus what you get is entirely random, so you just have to keep on grinding until it happens to give you what you wanted. 
If you want to play as killer, you will have to spend between 5 and 20 minutes queuing while waiting for survivors to join you. It sucks, but it is understandable given that there have to be four of them for every killer.
The fact that it uses QTEs and button mashing as a mechanic for survivors means it's hard to really say it's a good game as well, but at least it's not all the time and you can play killer without having to do any of that.

All things said, it isn't bad. I would say it is pretty reasonable. If you can get friends to join you in it it then you will have a much better time, but even just on your own it can be enjoyable every now and then. You get good value for the price, but remember that it will have its flaws and it will proudly display those flaws as intentional design choice

You know how frustrating to play this game when you as a rank 13 killer go against four swf with three rank 3 survivors carrying god blessing flashlight. Never think of hooking anyone. They will jump out of no where and flashlight you. This game doesn't even have a good matching system.
Moreover, this game literately has way less killer then survivors. When i play as survivor, i gonna wait like 20 mins to find a match. And it always ends within 10 mins.  But when play as killer, only 3 mins waiting. Btw, I was rank 13 killer and rank 14 survivor. (In the time of editing this review, I'm rank 5 killer and rank 13 survivor. Yes, i play this game alone and i don't wanna wait 20 mins to play 10 mins. ) 
So if you are new to this game and you don't have any friends to swf, I highly recommend you DO NOT buy this game. This is a competitive game WITHOUT any balanced matching system. 
There are tons of good games, so don't wast your money and time on this pitiful one.
It's been 2yrs since Aug 2016 and I'm still playing it!
